title: Container Mapping
description: Defines the location of Flow essence data in a container track

track_index.description: A zero-based and sequential track index in the container. This assumes a reliable ordering of tracks

format_track_index.description: A zero-based and sequential track index in the container for a particular Flow format. A container with a video and 2 audio tracks would have a format_track_index 0 for the video Flow and format_track_index 0 and 1 for the audio Flows. This assumes a reliable ordering of tracks for each Flow format

audio_track.description: Mapping for channels in audio tracks to the Flow channels

channel_numbers.description: Array of (zero-based) container channel numbers in Flow order

channel_range.description: Inclusive range of (zero-based) container channel numbers

mp2ts_container.description: Mapping to MPEG-2 Transport Stream containers, ISO/IEC 13818-1 or ITU-T Recommendation H.222.0

pid.description: The packet ID for the elementary stream packets

mxf_container.description: Mapping to Material Exchange Format containers, SMPTE ST 377-1

package_uid.description: The package UID. Either a SMPTE UMID URN or UUID URN

track_id.description: The track ID in the package

isobmff_container.description: Mapping to ISO Base Media File Format (e.g. MP4 and MOV) containers, ISO/IEC 14496-12
